Author:
Stephen Nusko Used to display all the entries contained in MainRun class.

createParagraph

public java.lang.String createParagraph(java.lang.String newString)
Creates a paragraph of multiple lines of the inputed String.

Parameters:

Returns:

makeLabelStyle

public static javax.swing.JTextArea makeLabelStyle(javax.swing.JTextArea textArea)
Changes all the settings to make a textArea appear like a label.

Parameters:

Returns:
Returns a JTextArea formatted to look like a label.
